titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Hampton Court on Sonday being the 12. day of Nouember, in the yeare of our Lord. 1570. VVherein is plainly proued Babylon to be Rome, both by Scriptures and doctors. Preached by VVilliam Fulke Bacheler of Diuinity, and fellow of S. Iohns Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
